info.task: navigate backwards to empty collapsed combobox
info.title: Navigate backwards to an empty, collapsed combobox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
